name: Gol.D.Roger
text: On Play: If you or your opponent have 10 DON!! cards on the field, your Leader gains +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next End Phase.

effect.text: If you or your opponent have 10 DON!! cards on the field, your Leader gains +2000 power until the end of your opponent's next End Phase.

powerMod.duration: until the end of your opponent's next End Phase
